CustomField.formula: IF( TEXT(Won_Lost_Drop_Type__c) = "Won", $Label.Won_Formula_label + " " + Opportunity__r.Name, IF( TEXT(Won_Lost_Drop_Type__c) = "Lost",$Label.Lost_Formula_label+ " " + Opportunity__r.Name, IF( TEXT(Won_Lost_Drop_Type__c) = "Drop",$Label.Drop_Formula_label+ " " + Opportunity__r.Name, "" )))
CustomField.label: Title
